Auto width columns

.col Add to the child elements to create auto width columns based on the content width.

.col-3
Takes 3 parts of a 12 col grid.

.col
Takes up content width.

Column fill availabe space

.flex-col-fill Add to parent

.col Add to child to fill available space

.col-3
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

.col
Fill available space.

Flex Equal Columns

.flex-col-equal Add to parent

.col Add to children to create equal width columns.

Flex Columns wrap

.flex-wrap Add to parent to wrap children.

.col-x Add to children to create columns with different width.

.col-3 = 25%
